application-statistics.description: Statistics about invalid packets and sessions collected by SOC-monitored protocol modules.

illegal-packet.description: Total number of received invalid packets.

illegal-packet-percent.description: Percentage of the number of invalid packets to the total number of packets.

total-session.description: Average rate of sessions received within 5 minutes.

illegal-session.description: Average rate of invalid sessions received within 5 minutes.

illegal-session-percent.description: Percentage of the number of invalid sessions to the total number of sessions received within 5 minutes.

application-statistics-history.description: Historical statistics about invalid packets and sessions collected by SOC-monitored protocol modules.

time-number.description: Time sequence number. In this example, the system collects statistics about invalid packets and sessions every 5 minutes. The smaller the time sequence number, the closer to the current time. For example, time sequence number 3 indicates the third 5 minutes from the current time.

illegal-packet-rate.description: Total rate of received invalid packets.

illegal-packet-percent.description: Percentage of the number of invalid packets to the total number of packets.

total-session-rate.description: Average rate of sessions received within 5 minutes.

illegal-session-rate.description: Average rate of invalid sessions received within 5 minutes.

illegal-session-percent.description: Percentage of the number of invalid sessions to the total number of sessions received within 5 minutes.

car-statistics.description: Statistics about protocol packets sent to the CPU.

passed-bytes.description: The number of passed packet bytes.

dropped-bytes.description: The number of discarded packet bytes.

car-statistics-history.description: Historical statistics about protocol packets sent to the CPU.

car-name.description: The type of protocol packet (to be sent to the CPU) on which a CAR action is performed.

time-number.description: Time sequence number. In this example, the system collects statistics about packets every 5 minutes. The smaller the time sequence number, the closer to the current time. For example, time sequence number 3 indicates the third 5 minutes from the current time.

cpu-usage-history.description: Historical statistics about CPU usage collected by SOC-monitored protocol modules.

time-number.description: Time sequence number. In this example, the system collects statistics about invalid packets and sessions every 5 minutes. The smaller the time sequence number, the closer to the current time. For example, time sequence number 3 indicates the third 5 minutes from the current time.

devm-group.description: Configure policies for global management and service plane protection.

soc.description: Configure policies for global management and service plane protection.

enable.description: Enable/disable layer 2 loop detection.

action.description: Configure the CPU in response to layer 2 loops after the system detects an existing or a potential loop on an interface, after layer 2 loop detection is enabled.

shutdown.description: Enable/disable shut down the interface after detecting an existing layer 2 loop on the interface.

up-times.description: The maximum number of consecutive times that the system allows the Down interface to go Up in an interval.

up-interval.description: The initial interval between when the interface shuts down and when it goes to the Up state.

trap.description: Configure a trap after detecting an existing or a potential layer 2 loop.

enable.description: Enable/disable the system from sending a trap after the system detects a layer 2 loop.

loop-level-thresholds.description: List of configure the loop level threshold on a detected main interface or sub-interface.

loop-level-threshold.description: Configure the loop level threshold on a detected main interface or sub-interface.

interface-type.description: Interface type, main interface or sub-interface.

contained-index.description: Information about the parent index of an entity.

parent-relative-position.description: Position of an entity relative to its parent entity.

is-fru.description: Whether the entity a replaceable unit.

ls-name.description: The LS name of the entity.

logic-entitys.description: List of information about logical entity.

logic-entity.description: Configure information about a logical entity.

parent-index.description: Information about the parent index of an entity.

parent-relative-position.description: Position of an entity relative to its parent entity.

slot-num.description: Number of slots on a chassis.

board-num.description: Number of boards on a chassis.

fan-num.description: Number of fans on a chassis.

power-num.description: Number of power modules for a chassis.

status-last-change.description: Time when the entity running status last changed.

entity-last-change.description: Time when the entity on chassis last changed.

dust-clean-cycle.description: Interval at which air filter dust is cleaned.

last-clean-date.description: Date when dust was last cleaned.

up-to-last-clean.description: Time past since dust was last cleaned.

monitor-board-changes.description: List of time when board status changes.

monitor-board-change.description: Operational data of time when the status of a board changes.

status-last-change.description: Time when the board running status changes.

entity-last-change.description: Time when the board entity changes.

up-time.description: MPU running time, expressed in the number of timeticks.

register-time.description: Time when a board goes Up.

loop-level-threshold.description: Configure the loop level threshold on a detected main interface or sub-interface.

interface-type.description: Interface type, main interface or sub-interface.

enable.description: Enable/disable the SOC's attack defense function.

user-disable-groups.description: List of a user-defined group for which attack defense is disabled. Enable/disable the user-defined group for which attack defense is disabled.

user-disable-group.description: Configure a user-defined group for which attack defense is disabled.

protocol-name.description: Specifys specific protocol packets for the user-defined group.

user-enable-groups.description: List of a user-defined group for which attack defense is enabled. Enable/disable the user-defined group for which attack defense is enabled.

user-enable-group.description: Configure a user-defined group for which attack defense is enabled.

protocol-name.description: Specifys specific protocol packets for the user-defined group.

threshold.description: Configure the threshold for attack detection.

cpu-usages.description: Configure the CPU usage threshold for attack detection.

cpu-usage.description: The CPU usage threshold for attack detection.

protocol-cars.description: List of set the rate threshold for sending protocol packets to the CPU and the packet loss percentage threshold for attack detection.

protocol-car.description: Configure the rate threshold for sending protocol packets to the CPU and the packet loss percentage threshold for attack detection.

protocol-name.description: The name of a protocol that supports CAR.

drop-packet-percent.description: The packet loss percentage threshold for CP-CAR.

attack-reason.description: Configure the threshold for determining the cause of an attack event.

broadcast-flood-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of broadcast packets to the total number of sampled packets.

change-source-packet-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of packets with varied source addresses to the total number of sampled packets.

app-packet-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the specified protocol packets to the total number of sampled packets.

attack-location-type.description: Configure the threshold for determining the location of an attack event.

interface-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets received on a physical interface to the total number of sampled packets.

sub-interface-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets received on a logical interface to the total number of sampled packets.

vlan-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of single-tagged VLAN packets with a specified VLAN ID to the total number of sampled packets.

source-mac-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with a specified source MAC address to the total number of sampled packets.

source-ip-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with a specified source IP address to the total number of sampled packets.

qinq-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of double-tagged VLAN packets with specified inner and outer VLAN IDs to the total number of sampled packets.

vni-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with a specified VNI to the total number of sampled packets.

attack-probabilitys.description: List of Configure the threshold for determining the probability of an attack event.

attack-probability.description: Configure the threshold for determining the probability of an attack event.

determine-object.description: Determining object of probability of attack event.

determined-threshold-value.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with specified characteristics to the total number of sampled packets. BROADCAST[90,99], APP_ERR[90,99], others[80,99]. determine-object with different value have different default determined-threshold-value values.

suspicion-threshold-value.description: Specifys the suspicion threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with specified characteristics to the total number of sampled packets. BROADCAST[70,90], APP_ERR[75,90], others[60,80]. determine-object with different value have different default suspicion-threshold-value values.

notification-threshold-value.description: Specifys the notification threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with specified characteristics to the total number of sampled packets. BROADCAST[50,70], APP_ERR[60,75], others[40,60]. determine-object with different value have different default notification-threshold-value.

number.description: The ordinal number of statistics records.

inner-vlan.description: Inner VLAN ID of an interface.

threshold.description: Configure the threshold for attack detection.

cpu-usages.description: Configure the CPU usage threshold for attack detection.

cpu-usage.description: The CPU usage threshold for attack detection.

protocol-cars.description: List of set the rate threshold for sending protocol packets to the CPU and the packet loss percentage threshold for attack detection.

protocol-car.description: Configure the rate threshold for sending protocol packets to the CPU and the packet loss percentage threshold for attack detection.

protocol-name.description: The name of a protocol that supports CAR.

drop-packet-percent.description: The packet loss percentage threshold for CP-CAR.

attack-reason.description: Configure the threshold for determining the cause of an attack event.

broadcast-flood-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of broadcast packets to the total number of sampled packets.

change-source-packet-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of packets with varied source addresses to the total number of sampled packets.

app-packet-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the specified protocol packets to the total number of sampled packets.

attack-location-type.description: Configure the threshold for determining the location of an attack event.

interface-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets received on a physical interface to the total number of sampled packets.

sub-interface-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets received on a logical interface to the total number of sampled packets.

vlan-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of single-tagged VLAN packets with a specified VLAN ID to the total number of sampled packets.

source-mac-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with a specified source MAC address to the total number of sampled packets.

source-ip-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with a specified source IP address to the total number of sampled packets.

qinq-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of double-tagged VLAN packets with specified inner and outer VLAN IDs to the total number of sampled packets.

vni-percent.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with a specified VNI to the total number of sampled packets.

attack-probabilitys.description: List of Configure the threshold for determining the probability of an attack event.

attack-probability.description: Configure the threshold for determining the probability of an attack event.

determine-object.description: Determining object of probability of attack event.

determined-threshold-value.description: Specifys the threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with specified characteristics to the total number of sampled packets. BROADCAST[90,99], APP_ERR[90,99], others[80,99]. determine-object with different value have different default determined-threshold-value values.

suspicion-threshold-value.description: Specifys the suspicion threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with specified characteristics to the total number of sampled packets. BROADCAST[70,90], APP_ERR[75,90], others[60,80]. determine-object with different value have different default suspicion-threshold-value values.

notification-threshold-value.description: Specifys the notification threshold for the percentage of the number of packets with specified characteristics to the total number of sampled packets. BROADCAST[50,70], APP_ERR[60,75], others[40,60]. determine-object with different value have different default notification-threshold-value.
